T02TD2337E:299b-1: shr'i tsakra samba ro pa de sha mu kha karna pa rampa ra tsint'a ma ni n'a ma /
T02TD2337E:299b-3: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i man ngag zhal nas snyan du brgyud pa yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya ba /
T02TD2337E:299b-4: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2337E:300a-0: sku gsum bdag nyid dgos 'byung bla ma dam pa'i zhabs @300a * //
T02TD2337E:300a-1: pad ze 'bru dri med 'od zer la phyag 'tshal //
T02TD2337E:300a-2: gsang sngags mthar thug snying po'i bcud phyung yid bzhin nor bu mkha' 'gro'i gsung bzhin rtogs pas 'dri gsal bkod //
T02TD2337E:300a-3: bde gshegs thugs la snang ba dri med panytsa pa nas rtogs pas ke ri li ru gsang bdag ma nyes //
T02TD2337E:300a-4: spyod pas zil mnan lus kyi bkod pas rnal 'byor rjes su bzung mdzad pa tha mas 'gro rnams stong par byas //
T02TD2337E:300a-5: bslab pa gsum dang brgyud par ldan pa nyams su myong bas 'jug tshul shes pas bla ma dam par shes //
T02TD2337E:300a-6: sen dha ba dang rigs chad bran ltar rus sbal spu ste mo gsham bu ltar slob ma skyon lnga bral //
T02TD2337E:300a-7: mchog gi don 'dod gang gi de brten thog mar dbang bzhis rgyud smin thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa nyid //
T02TD2337E:300a-8: 'di don rim bar brgyud pa rna bar 'pho byed de tshe sangs rgyas bstan gnas gus pas mnyan par gyis //
T02TD2337E:300a-9: sa yi cho ga lhag par gnas pa rig byed slob dpon rig sbyor sogs kyis bum pa'i dbang bskur bya //
T02TD2337E:300a-10: bslab pas rgyud mdzes thos bsam nor ldan bla mar 'os pa phul ba bla mas gsal stong la sogs bskur //
T02TD2337E:300a-11: nyer lnga lhag spangs rigs ldan rgyan spras zag bcas bskul sogs gsum pa byin nas brtul zhugs brtan par bya //
T02TD2337E:300a-12: dga' ba gsum son lha'ang cig skyes pa rnyog pa dang bral yul du bya sogs 'bras bur shes par gyi //
T02TD2337E:300a-13: dbang bzhi dang 'brel brda yis mtshon pa shes rab bdag nyid sindhu ra la mnyes sogs ston mos brgyan //
T02TD2337E:300a-14: slob dpon bzhi la dbang bzhi dus bzhi byed pa bcu gnyis chos nyid dbang la mtshon du med par byos //
T02TD2337E:300a-15: dbang gis smin nas rim pa gnyis shes rnal 'byor dbang phyug zung du 'jug pa rgyal ba'i sku sgrub phyir //
T02TD2337E:300a-16: dbang po'i rim pas dbye dang bsdu ba'i rim pa shes nas 'du 'dzi med par rgyun du 'bad pas spyad //
T02TD2337E:300a-17: tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi gsol dang khams sogs bslab pa 'khor lo tshogs brten rgyu 'bras nyid dang phra mor brjod //
T02TD2337E:300a-18: go cha ye shes rgyas btab sku gsung mchod dang bzlas pa rdzogs rim phrin las phyogs dang thub pa nyid //
T02TD2337E:300b-0: bsdus pa'i sbyor ba tshad med @300b bzhi ldan rdzus te skyes pa skad cig rnal 'byor bzlas par bcas pa nyid //
T02TD2337E:300b-1: brtan g-yo'i dngos po lhan cig skyes pa snang sems dbyer med rnon po'i spyod yul zung 'jug rdo rje'i sku //
T02TD2337E:300b-2: kun la khyab pa'i ngo bo nyid ston gsal rig mtshan nyid thub pa'i dbang po bde gshegs kun gyi gtso//
T02TD2337E:300b-3: gsum gsal bdag gis mngon sum nyid du legs par rtogs nas bsgom dang bzlas pa gsal por rab tu phye //
T02TD2337E:300b-4: chos dbyings skye med rgyal ba yum gcig rgyal dang rgyal ba nyid de nam mkha'i ri mo lta //
T02TD2337E:300b-5: brtan dang g-yo ba rten dang brten pa lha yi rang bzhin rang la bcug nas sna yi rtse mor rdo rje bzlas //
T02TD2337E:300b-6: gtor ma byin nas dbang po 'bring pos 'od gsal bsgoms te dbang sogs lam dang dam tshig 'bras bur bsre //
T02TD2337E:300b-7: bdag 'jug dbang dang bla ma mchod byed nyams chags bskang phyir rdo rje'i sems dpa' brtan pa'i cho ga bzlas //
T02TD2337E:300b-8: rgyal po blon po dmangs kyi byed pas mtshams kyi kun spyod za nyal 'gro dang khrus sogs rnal 'byor bya //
T02TD2337E:300b-9: rnam rtog dang bral zla ba drug tu nges par bsams nas grub pa'i mtshan ma mthong nas rol par gnas //
T02TD2337E:300b-10: thub pa'i bstan pa rgyas mdzad dngos grub mthar phyin zab dang rgya che ba dang gnyis med dam tshig kun gyi gzhi //
T02TD2337E:300b-11: bag yod bsgom zhing rten dang gsang ba mi bsag mi 'bral bza' bsrung mchog gyur thub pas rab tu gsungs //
T02TD2337E:300b-12: bslab pa gsum dang rgyu 'bras zhen med dbang sogs 'bras bu rgyud gzhan las gsungs rang sems brtan pas bsrungs //
T02TD2337E:300b-13: sku gsum la brten ting 'dzin gsum gyis rgya cher rab gsal gzhi lam 'bras bus lta ba mtshon par gyis //
T02TD2337E:300b-14: rnal 'byor srog rtsol sangs rgyas mnga' bdag g-yon dang g-yas su rim pa ji bzhin rgyu ba nges pa ste //
T02TD2337E:300b-15: mnyam par bzhag pas 'jug pa'i rlung nyid bum pa can du byas nas bstan pa'i go 'phang so sor thob //
T02TD2337E:300b-16: rlung gi sbyor ba 'di nyid mi shes las dang las min mi grub rlung rig pas ni 'bras bu ster //
T02TD2337E:300b-17: gdams pas tshe dang bzlas pa'i rim pa goms pas dge dang mi dge 'chi bzlog rlung rig pas ni shes //
T02TD2337E:301a-0: bya dang byed las chos mtshungs rgyu tshan gdams pa'i sbyor ba bskyed @301a * //
T02TD2337E:301a-1: rim goms pas mthun pa'i rkyen dang ldan //
T02TD2337E:301a-2: gsang spyod la gnas sdug bsngal bzod pas lus gnad gsum ldan dmigs pa bzhi las sbyor ba'i skyon bsal te //
T02TD2337E:301a-3: steng 'og bar du 'bugs pa'i sbyor ba li ri'i tshul du sgo gsum sbyang bar bya phyir nges par rol //
T02TD2337E:301a-4: rdo rje bzlas pa yig 'bru gsum la goms shing sangs rgyas lnga la kha dog so sor bslab par bya //
T02TD2337E:301a-5: 'byung ba lnga yi rlung zin pas ni du ba smig rgyu me khyer mar me sprin med nam mkha' 'byung //
T02TD2337E:301a-6: brtan pa'i rtags su zla zer nyi zer glog gi zer dang 'ja' tshon nyi zlar bsres pa dngos su mthong //
T02TD2337E:301a-7: spyod lam dang ni sbyor ba mkhas pas dug sogs gzhom dang 'chi ba rtag pa la sogs sna tshogs rgyur //
T02TD2337E:301a-8: rtsa dang rlung dang thig le 'dres pas bde gsal mi rtog rgyun mi 'chad par rgyal por 'gyur ro kye //
T02TD2337E:301a-9: rim pa 'di nyid 'phel bar bya phyir snang dmigs dngos po sgyu mar bsams la dben ba'i gnas su ni //
T02TD2337E:301a-10: rdo rje sems dpa' mtshan dpes spras pa'i gzugs brnyan la ni rab tu dmigs la dngos pa chu zla ltar //
T02TD2337E:301a-11: bcu gnyis sgyu ma'i dpe yis mtshon te mnyam rjes la ni chos brgyad las 'das mkha' bzhin snyoms par 'jug /
T02TD2337E:301a-12: de ltar shes pas mi bya ba med sngags zlos bsrung sogs mi dgos dge slong sogs la phyag mi bya //
T02TD2337E:301a-13: 'di dang mtshan dus bsre zhing sbyang dang goms pas gyen du 'phangs te bde gshegs bltas la chos sogs mnyan //
T02TD2337E:301a-14: rmi lam med dus gnad dang ldan pas 'dod chags la sogs brgyad cu 'gags nas snang ba gsum 'das te //
T02TD2337E:301a-15: rgyun mi 'chad pa'i 'od gsal chen pos sa bcur rgyur pa lam ma bgrod na rnam shes gong du 'pho //
T02TD2337E:301a-16: sna tshogs don chen mthong nas shes pa spong ste rim pa gnyis ldan 'jug phyir gzhan gyi mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD2337E:301a-17: chags dang chags bral 'di ma shes par gzhan ni don med dus gsum sangs rgyas bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam //
T02TD2337E:301a-18: ri bong rgyug dang zla ba chu 'dzin dus dang 'brel pa bslab bcas sangs rgyas dgongs pa mi shes phyir //
T02TD2337E:301b-0: sgo gsum gnad kyis sbyang bar bya zhing ngal na sna rtser bltas la @301b nges shes skyes nas chen por blta //
T02TD2337E:301b-1: dang po'i las kyi yid 'ong la brten goms pas sngags las zhing dang lhan cig skyes sogs rtsa bsnyen bya //
T02TD2337E:301b-2: cig car mgon po bsgoms nas mthar gnas rdo rje'i bzlas pa rtsa la mkhas pas padma'i skyon bzhi bsal //
T02TD2337E:301b-3: bde ba'i lam drangs ye shes mtshon pa mar la 'du bar rgyu 'bras shes nas zhes bya'i dkyil 'khor blta //
T02TD2337E:301b-4: thur sel gcud nas glang chen seng ge rma bya'i 'dren dang bya rgod stag mos snang dmigs bde bar 'char //
T02TD2337E:301b-5: sbyor bar dangs ma rlung dang mnyam zhing rig mas bde ba lus la spros nas rtsa mdud dgrol bar bya //
T02TD2337E:301b-6: bde ba'i nyams skyes tshogs drug kun la ro mnyam lugs las 'byung dang bzlog pas dga' bzhi mtshon par bya //
T02TD2337E:301b-7: dga' ba gsum dang dpe don bsres nas rgyu tshogs gzung 'dzin chos nyid goms nas rtsol med 'bras bu 'char //
T02TD2337E:301b-8: ye shes gsal byed dbang gi 'bras bur rdo rje'i lus la 'khor lor mdud pa spyi bor grol ba'i gnas //
T02TD2337E:301b-9: sgo dgu 'gags na sgo bzhi thim pa gnyis kyi rnam grol ye shes lus can sgra brnyan lta bur 'bral //
T02TD2337E:301b-10: mig sogs stong dang bdud bzhi grol ba chos nyid la mkhas gsum po gcig gyur ye shes rgyun chad med //
T02TD2337E:301b-11: gzhi lam 'bras bu gcig gyur bde chen dngos po ro mnyam yi ge bzhi don 'bras bu mngon du 'gyur //
T02TD2337E:301b-12: mthar ma skyol na nye bar spyod pa lus ldan bzhi dang nges shes brtags te ngo sprod shes par bya //
T02TD2337E:301b-13: skye shi bar do shes pa snga phyi gnyid du dran mtshams 'chi ba'i dus su phra rags thim nas ni //
T02TD2337E:301b-14: 'od gsal chen po de ma rtogs na bla ma sogs kyi skyel bsu nying mtshams rlung gsum bcing ba'i phyir //
T02TD2337E:301b-15: yon tan rdzogs pa bar dor longs sku yon tan bdun ldan de ma brtan na dug gsum las gyur pa'i //
T02TD2337E:301b-16: rtogs par bcad la dbang dus nyams dang lha sogs sgyu ma zung du 'jug pa slob dang mi slob pa //
T02TD2337E:301b-17: bdun phrag re la brgyal bar gyur pa de ma khegs na skye ba sna tshogs sprul sku nyid mtshams sbyor //
T02TD2337E:301b-18: bar do gsum la 'dod chags la sogs dug gsum shes pa zag med 'od gsal sgyu mar bsres la sgom //
T02TD2337E:302a-1: 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das las rgyal ba gnyis med zung 'jug phyag rgya chen por 'gyur //
T02TD2337E:302a-2: dbang dang dam tshig 'brel par shes ba gdod nas dag pa rkyen gyis bskur tshul nyams su blang dang rtogs //
T02TD2337E:302a-3: bum sogs dam tshig mnyam gzhag rjes spyod mi 'bral bza' bsrungs spros bcas spros med yan lag bshags bya nyid //
T02TD2337E:302a-4: dbang dus lta sogs mtshon par byas la bdud rigs ngos bzung zil gyis mnan nas sgom dang rtags su 'brel //
T02TD2337E:302a-5: tha ma 'bring dang rab dang mchog gyur 'jug sgo shes pas bsgoms la sbyar te gang dang gang la sogs //
T02TD2337E:302a-6: mchog gi dngos grub tshe 'dir 'dod pa dus dang 'brel bar spyod pa byas nas gol sa bcad par bya //
T02TD2337E:302a-7: bya dang spyod sogs tshogs su bsgyur la phrin las byed par rab gnas sbyin sreg rnam bzhis 'dod dgur bsgyur //
T02TD2337E:302a-8: 'khor lo bzhi la sku bzhir yan lag bdun ldan rdo rje sems dpa' sgo gsum ngo sprod mtshan dpes spras //
T02TD2337E:302a-9: rgyud rnams snying phyung man ngag bcud bsdus lam gyi rim pa bde gshegs kun thugs yid bzhin nor bu nyid //
T02TD2337E:302a-10: mi mthun phyogs las rgyal bar bya phyir 'jug pa'i tshul dang zhugs pa'i 'bras bu gsal ba'i thabs nyid do //
T02TD2337E:302a-11: lus la go gyon ngag gis g-yul sprad sems kyis mtshon bsnun sku gsung khrus bcud rlung dang 'khor lo bskor //
T02TD2337E:302a-12: rtsa ba drug la yan lag so dgus nad la sman dpyad bar chad srung 'khor gnad bral gegs bsal te //
T02TD2337E:302a-13: sa la sogs pa'i ro bzhi ngos bzung 'khor lo bzhi yis ro bzhi mnyam la zhi gnas phyogs la ni //
T02TD2337E:302a-14: thabs dang ldan pa pi wang sgra sogs rtsa rlung la ni shes rab sku gsum mthun sbyor rdzas sogs lnga //
T02TD2337E:302a-15: zin dang ma zin legs par shes nas lus kyi gnad la nyi ma zla sogs brdzis nas rdul sprugs byed //
T02TD2337E:302a-16: 'byung bzhi rlung la lte ba la sogs stong rab bcas nas na tsha bogs 'don 'gags 'khyil la sogs bsal //
T02TD2337E:302a-17: bcu pa'i rlung shes ting 'dzin rang grol sman pa lta bus brgyad po bsal nas dngul chu ltar sprad bya //
T02TD2337E:302b-0: dangs ma bsrubs nas skyon rnams sel phyir bdag tu lta ba'i @302b bud shing bsregs nas 'od gsal chos skur bsgral //
T02TD2337E:302b-1: 'di don rim brgyud bla ma la bsten gus pas blang phyir byin rlabs lam khyer snyan nas snyan du brgyud //
T02TD2337E:302b-2: mchog gi blo can brtse ba chen pos theg gzhan spangs pa smin dang grol ba rim pa gnyis la 'bad //
T02TD2337E:302b-3: snod bcud la sogs gzhal yas khang dang phung po khams sogs lha ru dag pas rgyal ba thams cad bsdu'o //
T02TD2337E:302b-4: rdo rje'i lus la bde chen gnas pas pho nya la sogs spros dang spros med 'khor lo zung du 'jug / rim pa 'di la mos pa brtan pas sprul pa mthong zhing skyon yon dang bcas chung ngu yin phyir tshogs //
T02TD2337E:302b-5: skad cig bzhi yis dga' ba gsum son 'bring po'i drod de lhan cig skyes pa dh'u t'i'i lam zhugs nas //
T02TD2337E:302b-6: 'jig rten las 'das brgya phrag bdun po yon tan gyis spras gnas dang nye gnas nyi shu bzhi la sogs //
T02TD2337E:302b-7: dangs ma yas byon p'ulli sogs khyab rgyu ba mas brtan bde chen brtol nas ma chags padma'i sa //
T02TD2337E:302b-8: rab bkram chen po phrag bdun yon tan ye shes gsal byed chos sku bdag nyid rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur //
T02TD2337E:302b-9: 'khor lo sdom pa'i bskyed rdzogs la sogs gting dpag dka' ba gsal por rab phye snyan brgyud mkha' 'gro'i gsang //
T02TD2337E:302b-10: dri med bsags pa'i dge ba des ni sa gsum gnas pa rdo rje 'dzin pa'i go 'phang thob par shog / yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya ba mkha' 'gro ma'i gsang tshig tilli pas bkod pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2337E:302b-12: // / rtsigs kyi rgya mdud dang bcas pa n'a ro pandi ta'i zhal snga nas dang /
T02TD2337E:302b-13: lo ts'a ba mar pa chos kyi blo gros kyis pushpa ha ri'i gnas su bsgyur ba'o//
